actions.message:
‚èØ `c?play` - Plays a song from YouTube (keyword search supported)
‚è≠ `c?skip` - Skips the current song
‚è∏ `c?stop` - Stop music and leaves voice channel
üîä `c?volume` - Sets the volume to a specific level
üìÑ `c?queue` - View the current song queue
üéµ `c?nowplaying` - View the current song
üóí `c?lyrics` - Displays lyrics of a song
If you add a role called "DJ" to your server then all music commands will be limited to users with the role.
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
üìñ `c?definition` - The "truth" about something // Urban Dictionary (Needs to be in a NSFW channel)
üòù `c?meme` - Sends you a random meme from r/memes
‚Ñπ `c?userinfo` - Tells you information about a specific user
üìù `c?serverinfo`
üîû `c?hentai` - Sends hentai image/GIF
üîû `c?neko` - Sends random neko GIF
üîû `c?boobs` - Sends neko boobs
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
`c?set-welcome` - Configures and enables welcome messages
`c?toggle-welcome` - Disables/Enables welcome messages again
`c?toggle-invitefilter` Toggles a discord invite link filter for non-staff members
(Requires Manage Guild permission)
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
üë¢ `c?kick` - Kicks a member from this server
üîí `c?ban` - Bans a member from this server
üóë `c?purge` - Deletes multiple messages at once
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
‚ùî `c?help` - Displays all available commands
üìû `c?callsupport` - Lets a supporter join your server if you need help with me (Requires Manage Server permission)
‚ùï `c?botinfo` - View information about me
‚¨Ü `c?vote` - Checks if you have voted -> More features permanently
üíå `c?invite` - Sends you the invite link of me
actions.name: Set Embed Description
